pages.text: $(li)Sugar Cane are a kind of tall grass that can be found near of water in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can use Sugar Canes to craft Seed Pouch, Paper, Sugar, Reed Thatch, or Sugar Cane Bundle in a Crafting Table.
$(li)You can plant it in a block of Sand or Dirt while there is a water block near it.$(br)$(li)There is no difference in groth rate using one of those blocks.
